property.name: Script Body
property.value:
retryAttrName = "retry.elastic" max = int(maxRetries.getValue()) flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None): retryAttr = flowFile.getAttribute( retryAttrName ) if( retryAttr == None ): flowFile = session.putAttribute( flowFile , retryAttrName , '1' ) session.transfer( flowFile , REL_SUCCESS ) else: retry = int(retryAttr) if retry <= max: flowFile = session.putAttribute( flowFile , retryAttrName , str(retry+1) ) session.penalize( flowFile ) session.transfer( flowFile , REL_SUCCESS ) else: flowFile = session.putAttribute( flowFile , "retry.failure" , "Max retries exceeded" ) session.transfer( flowFile , REL_FAILURE )

property.name: Script Body
property.value:
retryAttrName = "retry.enrichment" max = int(maxRetries.getValue()) flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None): retryAttr = flowFile.getAttribute( retryAttrName ) if( retryAttr == None ): flowFile = session.putAttribute( flowFile , retryAttrName , '1' ) session.transfer( flowFile , REL_SUCCESS ) else: retry = int(retryAttr) if retry <= max: flowFile = session.putAttribute( flowFile , retryAttrName , str(retry+1) ) session.penalize( flowFile ) session.transfer( flowFile , REL_SUCCESS ) else: flowFile = session.putAttribute( flowFile , "retry.failure" , "Max retries exceeded" ) session.transfer( flowFile , REL_FAILURE )
